settings.name: VIDEONORMALLEVEL

settings.name: f1fbfde2-a960-4165-9f88-50667911ce96
settings.description: Display brightness level in % when the display gets dimmed

settings.name: VIDEODIM
settings.description: Display is dimmed after the given timeout in seconds

settings.name: VIDEOIDLE
settings.description: Turn off display after the given timeout in seconds

settings.name: VIDEOCONLOCK
settings.description: Turn off display after the given timeout in seconds when system is locked

settings.name: STANDBYIDLE
settings.description: Timeout in seconds before system goes to sleep

settings.name: UNATTENDSLEEP
settings.description: Timeout in seconds before system enters sleep after waking up unattended

settings.name: HIBERNATEIDLE
settings.description: Hibernate after the given timeout in seconds post sleep

settings.name: RTCWAKE
settings.description: Timed events are allowed to wake system from sleep

settings.name: PROCTHROTTLEMIN
settings.description: Minimum performance state of the system in %

settings.name: ESBRIGHTNESS
settings.description: Brightness in % to scale to when Energy Saver is turned on

settings.name: ASPM
settings.description: Power plan for PCI Express link

settings.name: DEVICEIDLE
settings.description: Idle timeout strategy to use (Performance or Conservation)

settings.name: CONSOLELOCK
settings.description: Need to enter password when the system resumes from sleep

settings.name: DISCONNECTEDSTANDBYMODE
settings.description: Standby mode when disconnected from network
